resources.string: Cant crop the image, change the points
Your phone is low on memory, you may feel some lags while editing images.
Cannot start the barcode reader because the camera permission was not granted.
Access to the camera is needed for barcode detection.
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission is needed to save cropped image.
READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission is needed to pick image.
Sorry, the Android camera encountered a problem. You may need to restart the device.
Place a barcode inside the viewfinder rectangle to scan it.
